entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ChainedConfigurationSource doesn't support reloading manually #58683
  • Determine from Host when HostedServices have completed / stopped working #58675

Closed

  • Assertion failed '(m_firstNode == m_lastNode) || (Contains(m_lastNode))' #58396
    6.0.0
  • [6.0] No build warning from RequiredPreviewFeatures attribute? #58419
    6.0.0
  • WinHttp tests with Tls 1.3 are failing #58587
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow contained indirections in tailcalls on x64 #58686
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update ServiceProviderServiceExtensions.cs #58685
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] The signal enum in the native library should match the managed code. #58682
    area-System.Net
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • Zeroinit delay alloc #58677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete duplicate runtime tests #58676
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • The signal enum in the native library should match the managed code. #58658
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Replace S.S.Permissions ref with AccessControl in S.S.C.Xml #58666
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.0
  • Do Contain analysis after inserting node in block range #58605
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add TLS 1.3 support to WinHttp #58590
    area-System.Net.Http, os-windows, 7.0.0
  • Fix Native Digit Reading #58598
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [IGNORE][wasm] Building Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #58578
    area-Build-mono
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Support fast tailcalls in R2R #56669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Universal arm crossgen compiler #58279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch weights to doubles to mitigate rounding inaccuracies and use epsilon when sorting locals #58630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add documentation to System.Net #57855
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • JIT: relax assert in lvaSetDoNotEnregister #58597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • add W11 test queue #58570
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable test parallelization in installer tests #58604
    area-HostModel
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [resubmit] Fix bug of FastReducer used in BigInteger.ModPow #55122
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Implement SinPi, CosPi and TanPi and inverses #53675
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returns bogus value for exponents above 1000 #55397
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Rewrite XslNumber.ConvertToDecimal #55868
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix LDAP StartTLS on Linux #56641
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Validate CompressionLevel in BrotliStream ctor #57440
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use ref local in `MulticastDelegate.TrySetSlot` #56842
    area-System.Runtime, needs more info, community-contribution
  • Rev Alpine WithNode from 3.9 to 3.13 #57324
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Add support for variance to IDIC #58646
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Retarget DOTNETHOME when installing x64 on ARM64 #58669
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Add default value of 0 for EventSource.EventData.Reserved #58671
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
